job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Looking for motivated front-end/mobile/full-stack engineers ready to take on the challenge of working for a fast-paced start up. We have a very up to date stack that will provide you with experience in a distributed microservice architecture that leverages many top current technologies. We are looking for someone who is a big team player and likes to engage in building solutions from beginning to end with the team.   Required Experience: - Experience with modern JS frameworks (React, Angular, Vue) OR Flutter GraphQL - 2+ years of experience building modern web/mobile applications - Unit testing, e2e testing - Event driven architectures, microservice architecture  Bonus Experience: - Kubernetes, Docker - AWS - C# - Kafka, Confluent
